sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useApp } from '../context/AppContext'; import { CreditCardIcon, ShieldCheckIcon, TruckIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const BillingPage = () => { const { state, clearCart, addNotification, setCurrentPage } = useApp(); const [billingData, setBillingData] = useState({ email: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', address: '', city: '', state: '', zipCode: '', country: 'United States', phone: '', shippingSameAsBilling: true, shippingAddress: { firstName: '', lastName: '', address: '', city: '', state: '', zipCode: '', country: 'United States' } }); const [paymentData, setPaymentData] = useState({ cardNumber: '', expiryDate: '', cvv: '', nameOnCard: '', saveCard: false }); const subtotal = state.cart.reduce((total, item) => total + (item.price * item.quantity), 0); const shipping = subtotal > 500 ? 0 : 25; const tax = subtotal * 0.08; const total = subtotal + shipping + tax; const handleBillingChange = (field, value) => { setBillingData(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; const handleShippingChange = (field, value) => { setBillingData(prev => ({ ...prev, shippingAddress: { ...prev.shippingAddress, [field]: value } })); }; const handlePaymentChange = (field, value) => { setPaymentData(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Simulate order processing const orderId = `SJC-${Date.now()}`; addNotification({ type: 'success', title: 'Order Placed Successfully!', message: `Your order ${orderId} has been confirmed. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly.` }); clearCart(); setCurrentPage('home'); }; if (state.cart.length === 0) { return (

Your cart is empty

Add items to your cart before proceeding to checkout

); } return (

Checkout

Complete your purchase securely

{/* Main Checkout Form */}
{/* Contact Information */}

Contact Information

handleBillingChange('email', e.target.value)} placeholder="your@email.com" className="form-input" />
handleBillingChange('firstName', e.target.value)} className="form-input" />
handleBillingChange('lastName', e.target.value)} className="form-input" />
handleBillingChange('phone', e.target.value)} placeholder="(555) 123-4567" className="form-input" />
{/* Billing Address */}

Billing Address

handleBillingChange('address', e.target.value)} className="form-input" />
handleBillingChange('city', e.target.value)} className="form-input" />
handleBillingChange('zipCode', e.target.value)} className="form-input" />
{/* Shipping Address */}

Shipping Address

{!billingData.shippingSameAsBilling && (
handleShippingChange('firstName', e.target.value)} className="form-input" />
handleShippingChange('lastName', e.target.value)} className="form-input" />
handleShippingChange('address', e.target.value)} className="form-input" />
handleShippingChange('city', e.target.value)} className="form-input" />
handleShippingChange('zipCode', e.target.value)} className="form-input" />
)}
{/* Payment Information */}

Payment Information

handlePaymentChange('cardNumber', e.target.value)} placeholder="1234 5678 9012 3456" className="form-input" />
handlePaymentChange('expiryDate', e.target.value)} placeholder="MM/YY" className="form-input" />
handlePaymentChange('cvv', e.target.value)} placeholder="123" className="form-input" />
handlePaymentChange('nameOnCard', e.target.value)} className="form-input" />
{/* Order Summary */}

Order Summary

{/* Items */}
{state.cart.map((item) => (

{item.name}

Qty: {item.quantity}

${(item.price * item.quantity).toLocaleString()}

))}
{/* Totals */}
Subtotal ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Shipping {shipping === 0 ? 'Free' : `$${shipping.toFixed(2)}`}
Tax ${tax.toFixed(2)}
Total ${total.toFixed(2)}
{/* Security Features */}
SSL encrypted checkout
Free returns within 30 days
Multiple payment options
{/* Place Order Button */}

By placing your order, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

); }; export default BillingPage;
